description:
The samurai second in command with the style called “Shadow School”, the assassination swords which forbids the use of magic. His ultimate attack is said to make the recipient lose sight of the sword, and it is rumoured that his prowess as a swordsman even surpasses that of Joshua. His favourite sword is Kuroyasha, a demon blade which has black blade. He is said to have an avenger for his late wife among the Twelve Demon Warlords.
Source: Official page
name: Schen Karr
